sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves a list of locations available with in the specified project.

Inputs :

  • Project ID - Unique ID of the project.
  • Location - Name of the location.

Outputs :

  • Function - JSON object containing Labels and Names of the functions.

To use this action, the corresponding Google Cloud Functions connection and credential must be created and associated with the Google Cloud Functions Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Look up Function
